About.paragraph: Specialized in travel across Morocco, we offer tailor-made tours by 4x4, camelback, or on foot for hiking or trekking in the Zagora desert. With our expert guides and know-how, we provide a unique experience for your stay in the Zagora region. Meet the locals, be accompanied by our experienced guides, discover life in a bivouac, or embark on a trek while staying with locals, in a kasbah, or in a tent in the heart of the desert

Features.title: Begin from Chigaga
Features.text: Erg Chigaga, one of the jewels of the Moroccan desert, stands out with its majestic dunes stretching as far as the eye can see, reaching heights of over 300 meters...

Features.title: Begin from Ouarzazate
Features.text: Ouarzazate, known as the Gateway to the Desert, is a city of captivating charm nestled at the crossroads of the Atlas Mountains and the Sahara...

Features.title: Begin from Zagora
Features.text: Zagora, the iconic gateway to the Sahara, boasts enchanting landscapes with its kasbahs, palm groves, and ancient traditions...
